item.title: Backblaze B2 數據存儲使用 Cloudflare Workers 加速
item.description: 1. 在 Backblaze B2 文件上傳后 此時生成的外鏈 URL 為 https://f000.backblazeb2.com/file/{bucketName}/test.jpg 2. 前往 Cloudflare Workers 新建一個 Workers // Website you intended to retrieve for users. const upstream = 'f000.backblazeb2.com' // Website you intended to retrieve for users using mobile devices. const upstream_mobile = 'f000.backblazeb2.com' // Countries and regions where you wish to suspend your service. const blocked_region = [] // IP addresses which you wish to block from using your service. const blocked_ip_address = ['0.
